column1: INSTRUCTIONS: The first 6 lines are for instruction purposes only. This application will ignore any data found within those rows. Your data will start on row 7.
CRITERION COLUMN: This column is the name of the WCAG violation. It is displayed as the number only (e.g. 1.1.1).

EXCEPTION: Each column with exception is for one additional exception found against that WCAG criterion. Each cell may take a sentence. These will all be seperated out as individual items within their criterion and not as one large paragraph.
DIRECTION OF DATA: Your inputs on exceptions will start in column B. And will be input from the left side towards the right side as more exceptions are added.
